mapper.select: SELECT messageid, fromuserid, targetuserid, messagetype, status, content, createtime, receivetime FROM rtmessage WHERE messageid = #{messageid}
SELECT messageid, fromuserid, targetuserid, messagetype, status, content, createtime, receivetime FROM rtmessage WHERE messageid = #{messageid} ORDER BY createtime
SELECT messageid, fromuserid, targetuserid, messagetype, status, content, createtime, receivetime FROM rtmessage ORDER BY createtime LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into rtmessage ( fromuserid, targetuserid, messagetype, status, content, createtime, receivetime) values (#{fromuserid}, #{targetuserid}, #{messagetype}, #{status}, #{content}, #{createtime}, #{receivetime})
mapper.update: update rtmessage set fromuserid=#{fromuserid}, targetuserid=#{targetuserid}, messagetype=#{messagetype}, status=#{status}, content=#{content}, status=#{status}, createtime=#{createtime}, receivetime=#{receivetime} where messageid=#{messageid}
